CustomField.formula: "products/detail?p=" + SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( Name, " ", "-" ), "&", "and" ), "'", "-"), ":", "-"), "," ,"-"), "+", "-"), ".", "-"), "#", "-"), "@", "-"), "~", "-") + "_" + Id
CustomField.label: Detail URL
